Dialogue.Page: Mindscapes is the mod that won third place in the second mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community.
This mod tasks the player with convincing Slate that the imminent death of the Sun is going to happen using a new Nomai artifact that allows one person to invade the mind of another.
This may turn out not to be a simple task however, as Slate has true mastery over their mind and is able to keep the player secluded to a small area of it. Perhaps thereâ€™s a way to break out?
